name: Classic Hollywood Films and Their Impact
description: Discover the films that shaped Hollywood and left an indelible impact on cinema.

flashcards.question: Which film is credited with the first use of the 'dolly zoom'?
What movie made the phrase 'Here's looking at you, kid' famous?
Which movie featured the character Scarlett O'Hara?
What is the name of the fictional nightclub in 'Casablanca'?
Which film was the first to win the Big Five Oscars?
Who played the role of Atticus Finch in 'To Kill a Mockingbird'?
What film popularized the line 'There's no place like home'?
In which film does Marlon Brando scream 'Stella!'?
What movie popularized the song 'As Time Goes By'?
